title: How Rich Is 21 Savage? | The Real Net Worth

json.text: With an estimated net worth of $2 Million it’s no wonder 21 Savage can survive being
shot 6 times, received a Ferrari for his birthday from rapper pal, Drake and was listed as one
of the top five paid rappers in the industry, beating out 50 Cent.
With that being said, welcome to The Real Net Worth, where we explore your favorite
celebrities, businesses, properties and all other assets in between, so let’s begin
and take a closer look at, 21 Savage’s Real Net Worth.
First off, who is 21 Savage American hip-hop recording artist from Atlanta,
Georgia, 21 Savage, was born Shayaa Bin Abraham-Joseph on Oct. 22, 1992.
He is best known for his mixtapes, The Slaughter Tape and Slaughter King, as well as his extended
plays (EP), Free Guwop and Savage Mode, with producer Metro Bloomin.
He is easily recognized for his trademark dagger tattoo in the middle of his forehead,
a tribute to his deceased brother.
21 Savage has a strong history of violence, beginning with bringing a gun to school in
7th grade, His rise to fame began with his single, “Picky” produced by DJ Plugg,
which was released on Nov. 12, 2014.
It was also released on his debut mixtape, The Slaughter Tape, on May 25, 2015.
In July of that year, 21 Savage released a collaborative EP, Free Guwop, with Sonny Digital
that was a tribute to fellow rapper and influence Gucci Mane.
His second mixtape, Slaughter King, was released Dec. 1, 2015.
In June 2016, 21 Savage was named as one of XXL Magazine’s Freshman Class.
The following month, he released his joint EP Savage Mode with record producer Metro
Boomin, which gained international success and peaked at No. 44 on the Billboard 200
– becoming the highest charting EP to date.
His single, “X” featuring Future, went platinum, 21 Savage’s first platinum record.
In January 2017, 21 Savage signed with Epic Records.
21 Savage has a close group that he surrounds himself with.
Everyone in the group has the number “21” tattooed somewhere on their body.
“21” refers to the neighborhood gang he was apart of.
while 21 Savage isn’t in the studio making hits, he’s usually filling kylie jenner’s
dm’s with dick pics, which i’m sure tyga doesn’t appreciate it, but then again, i’m
sure tyga also gets a copy.
We don’t know exactly where 21 Savage lives, but it’s rumored that his sugar daddy drake,
recently purchased him his own mansion, damn, where was he when i was on catch me a sugar
daddy dot com.
Now let’s talk about what 21 Savage drives daily, well his most notable car has to be
his $350,000 Ferrari F12 Berlinetta that was gifted to him from Drake for his 24th birthday,
damn, my friends don’t buy me SHIT for my birthday.
Now how does 21 Savage make all his money?
well as a hip-hop recording artist, he’s best known for his mixtapes, The Slaughter
Tape and Slaughter King, and his EP, Free Guwop and Savage Mode.
Which combined have sold millions, Savage also makes a good chunk of change off his
live shows, which sell out in minutes due to his growing popularity.
If you enjoyed this video make sure to drop us a like, and If there's someone you’d
like us to cover next, let us know in the comment section below, because money isn’t
everything, it’s the only thing, so check out another one of our videos, and then go
out n get that money, because your self-worth is your net worth.
